main.name: Sergi Prat
main.bio: I am a system administrator specialized in virtualization with the vSphere platform, Office 365, Active Directory, Veeam Backup and Zabbix. I consider myself an orderly and perfectionist person, I am good at organizing work groups and taking responsibilities.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Development and implementation of security countermeasures, Python and Bash scripting, Offensive Pentesting, Ethical Hacking, Dockerization, legislation & ISO 27001...
Administer and maintain computer systems, guaranteeing the functionality & the integrity of the system's resources and services, with the required quality and complying the current regulations.
Install and maintain fixed and mobile network services, Internet services and computer systems and also provide support to users

work.title: System administrator
work.description: Manage and maintain the integrity, scalability and availability of the company's computer system both at a physical and cloud level. This includes handling tasks related to: networking, virtualization (vSphere), Active Directory, Microsoft 365, backup management (Veeam Backup), Zabbix and documentation.
